products.description_en:
Unveil your most radiant skin with the 24K Gold Sensitive Skin Polish, part of the L'Oréal Gold Facial Kit. Infused with real 24K Gold flecks, this luxurious skin polish provides a gentle yet effective resurfacing experience designed specifically for sensitive complexions. It expertly addresses the concerns of oily and blemish-prone skin by helping to reduce oiliness and creating a protective barrier against breakouts, blemishes, and acne. Treat your skin to the ultimate clarifying indulgence and step out with a smooth, protected, and glowing complexion.

Key Benefits: Gentle exfoliation, oil control, reduces appearance of blemishes and acne, soothes sensitive skin.

Star Ingredient: Real 24K Gold.

Skin Type: Sensitive, Oily, Blemish-Prone.

products.description_en:
Unlock the ancient secret to clear, bright skin with The Rice Brightening Glow Cleanser. This creamy, luxurious cleanser harnesses the natural power of Rice to deliver a visibly whitening and brightening effect. It works gently to wash away impurities, dirt, and makeup while actively helping to even out your skin tone and reduce the appearance of dullness. Integrate this cleanser into your daily routine for a complexion that feels soft, looks luminous, and glows with natural vitality.

Key Action: Whitening & Brightening

Star Ingredient: Rice

Benefit: Cleanses, brightens, and evens skin tone for a luminous look.

products.title_ar: Dr. Rashel White Skin Whitening Fade Spots Serum
products.description_en:
Target stubborn dark spots and pigmentation with the Dr. Rashel White Skin Whitening Fade Spots Serum. This potent formula is enriched with key ingredients like Arbutin and Niacinamide to effectively Reduce Pigmentation and Fade Dark Spots. Regular application helps to achieve Smoother & Whiter Skin by promoting an even skin tone and a brighter complexion.

Key Action: Reduces pigmentation and Fades Dark Spots.

Key Ingredients: Arbutin and Niacinamide.

Unique Feature: Designed for Whitening and spot correction.

products.title_en: CeraVe Hydrating Value Pack - Clay Mask, Polish, and Massage Cream
products.title_ar: CeraVe Hydrating Value Pack - Clay Mask, Polish, and Massage Cream
products.description_en:
Give your skin the complete care it deserves with the CeraVe Hydrating Value Pack, developed with dermatologists. This 3-in-1 facial kit is formulated For All Type of Skin and includes three essential ceramides & hyaluronic acid to help restore the protective skin barrier.

The kit contains:

Hydrating Clay Mask: Removes toxins from skin, leaving it soft, smooth, and flawless.

Hydrating Facial Skin Polish: Functions as a face wash and helps restore the protective skin barrier.

Hydrating Message Cream: Removes wrinkles and age signs, helping to restore the protective skin barrier.
Key Action: Deep Cleansing, Exfoliation, and Moisturizing.

Key Ingredient: Avocado.

Unique Benefit: Leaves skin hydrated and smooth.
Key Action: Reduces pigmentation and Fades Dark Spots.

Key Ingredients: Arbutin and Niacinamide.

Unique Feature: Designed for Whitening and spot correction.

Key Action: Hair growth support, circulation booster, and aromatherapy.
